attributes.action: Stop fining parents for family holidays during term time
attributes.additional_details: Families struggle with the cost of holidays during school holidays- family time is extremely important in building confident happy children with strong family relationships and preventing parents from going on holiday with their children for a week when they can financially afford to do so is criminal so these fines should be stopped
attributes.background: Stop fining parents who take their children out of school for family holidays

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Allow parents to take their children out of school for up to 10 days fine free:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700047
